citation.article-title: Description of Idiomarina insulisalsae sp. nov., isolated from the soil of a sea salt evaporation pond, proposal to transfer the species of the genus Pseudidiomarina to the genus Idiomarina and emended description of the genus Idiomarina

p.s: Description of Idiomarina taiwanensis comb. nov.
Idiomarina taiwanensis (tai.wan.en'sis. N.L. fem. adj. taiwanensis pertaining to Taiwan, where the species was isolated).
Basonym: Pseudidiomarina taiwanensis Jean et al. [11].
The description is identical to that given for Pseudidiomarina taiwanensis by Jean et al. [11].
The type strain, PIT1T (=BCRC 17465T=JCM 13360T), was isolated from shallow coastal water of An-Ping Harbour, Taiwan.
